skills.full-stack-web-developer: In charge of managing each of the aspects concerning the creation and maintenance of a web application. Expert in Front-End and Back-End development.
skills.agile-coach: Agility expert with the necessary competencies and skills to help people adopt the agile mindset, enabling you to understand agile principles and values.
skills.dev-ops: Set of practices that bring together software development ( Dev ) and IT operations ( Ops ). Its goal is to speed up the software development life cycle and provide high-quality continuous delivery.
